task.title: Creating enumerations with support for bitmask

prereq.p: The following steps assume that you have a domain model file in your project."
Limitation : Enumeration with support for bitmask is limited to User Defined Entities.

step.cmd: In the Project Explorer view pane, double-click on the desired domain model file.
step.stepresult: The file and its elements are displayed in the Editor area.

step.cmd:
In the Editor area, right-click on the domain model file name (which is usually the first node) and select
New Enumeration
.
Go to the Properties view pane located below the Editor area and complete the fields to edit the enumeration's properties.
